title: Wards missing from the store (plz help)
body:
I have just come back from my holiday in Aussie (I'm from NZ) and i wanted to buy the poro wards that didn't come out during the showdown, apparently they came out in 5.1 (when i was overseas without a computer) so i thought id pick them up now I'm back, but only the Underworld poro skin is in the store 
and not the battlecast or dragonslayer ones, i was wondering if someone could help me locate them?
or tell me why they aren't in the store? thanks :)

replies.body:
Only underworld poro skin has been released so far, I think riotkateykhaos posted something on twitter about it

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/01/red-post-collection-underworld-poro.html

 No sign of Battlecast Poro  Wardand Dragonslayer Poro Ward  - the other two new ward skins added in 5.1 - yet but Riot KateyKhaos commented:
"Only the Underworld one is available. The other two will be released throughout the patch!"
You forgot to feed them their cookies! so they run away, being a ward if a very tiring job for a poro
